TEXT.TITLE: BANKERS TRUST <BT> DEBT DOWNGRADED BY MOODY'S
TEXT.BODY: Moody's Investors Service Inc said it downgraded 1.7 billion dlrs of debt of Bankers Trust New York Corp, lead bank Bankers Trust Co and other subsidiaries. It said the slate of key competitors in Bankers Trust's principal markets shifted as the bank repositioned itself into the global institutional markets. Moody's said the substantial new capital committed to these markets, and the size of direct competitors, increased the uncertainty of future performance. Cut were the parent's senior and guaranteed debt to Aa-3 from Aa-2 and subordinated debt to A-1 from Aa-3 and the lead bank's long-term debt and deposits to Aa-1 from Aaa. Reuter
